text: "I have no complaints with Embrace other‚Ä¶ I have no complaints with Embrace other than their APP never seams to work when I need it. Other wise excellent ! Submit claim and in 2 to 3 days your reimbursement is in the bank. Love it! If only personal health insurance was that Easy!!!"

"Embrace Answers The rep I spoke to was very understanding and said to submit my claim for my lost pet again and shell see if they will honor it. Anytime I had questions they were there to help me . Its great knowing the company is truly animal friendly !"

"Very pleased with Embrace Pet Insurance. I have the normal insurance plus the Wellness addition. I have had a few claims with the Wellness part and have found it very easy to file the claim and received a response within a couple of days. Very pleased with the quick response. I have had the opportunity to speak with customer support and was pleased with the friendly and supportive assistance."

"Do not use them Do not use them. After years a decade and a half of using them the abruptly changed my monthly premium for two dogs to 1200$ from 400$ which had been steadily increasing. The maximum pay out is $10000 because I set this up in 2010. Its a disgrace that they treat senior dogs like this. Clearly this is a business and they dont care about your pets. I recommend looking elsewhere or invest the same money into a money market or low risk investment account. I will never use them again."
"The claims process was very simple."
"Ripped me off Ripped me off. I only had my policy a couple days and then they abruptly canceled it and kept my money. I tried to get in touch with them and they are not answering."

"Handled our claim with thoughtfulness as well as efficiency. We recently had to say goodbye to our faithful dog Nelson after several visits to the vet. Embrace handled our claim almost immediately. They sent a thoughtful message with condolences and were very help during this difficult time. They also took the time to remove Nelson from our account so I did not have to worry about getting that done and applied a credit for the remaining days of his coverage to our account for our other dogs."

"Quick Response Embrace has a very quick response time. My claim was viewed within 24 hours. The app on my phone made it very convenient and easy to complete. The information they give is easily understood."

"Avoid this company they will drop your senior dog when you need them most. I was an Embrace customer for over 13 years and used to recommend them to everyone. Sadly I cant say that anymore. This year they raised the premium on my 15-year-old chihuahua from about $2000 to over $10000 annually even with the multi-pet discount. The plan only pays out a maximum of $10000 per year so the new price makes the coverage essentially worthless. Theyre pushing us off the policy without technically cancelling us. My dog has been insured with Embrace since he was 3 and had more than a decade of healthy years with almost no issues. Now that hes developed two conditions that count as pre-existing no other insurer will cover him in any meaningful way. After more than a decade of loyalty were left uninsured when he needs help the most. When I called Embrace for an explanation all I got was a canned response about state-approved rates and rising veterinary costs. Yes vet care has gone up but nothing justifies a fivefold increase in one year. Because of this experience Ill also be removing my younger dog from Embrace. A company that treats long-term customers this way does not deserve our trust."

"Embrace is a top notch pet insurance company Embrace provides a very easy claims process with reimbursement sometimes happening on the same day. It also provides great coverage for the money. The support staff is empathetic and very helpful even offering suggestions to lower premium costs without jeopardizing coverage. We have two dogs who have been covered by Embrace for many years and some serious medical issues."

"Glad to be here I just signed up for my 2 cats after my last company jacked up the premium for one cat from $160 per month to $550. The person I spoke with was pleasant clear and informative. The sign up process was easy and quick. The rates were very good. So far so good."
"FIXED A PROBLEM IN A TIMELY MANNER."

"Thank goodness for Dog insurance with Embrace My dog was hit by a car and Embrace were very helpful when I called them about this. I submitted all the paper work and received payment within a few days. Would recommend them Easy to use system for claims and extremely polite staff."
"Efficient Fast thorough and efficient claim process."

"Very pleased with Embrace Embrace Insurance has a easy to use app for filing claims and they provide excellent communication about the status of a claim. I am very pleased with the coverage our policy has provided."

"They can cant answer my questions I keep calling I get no answers today. I got put on hold and then to a voicemail which no ones responded to. I haven paid any of my claims since August so I would say I am not a very happy customer. They used to be great but now not so much.."

"I am going to be honest I am going to be honest: I was worried. But my first claim ever submitted was so easy and the wonderful employees at Embrace processed it so quickly delivering me a comprehensive breakdown and everything and a quick return on my refund. My pup needed extensive testing with a specialist and I would do anything for him. Embrace gave me peace of mind that I could do that and more within my policy and have the financial help I needed to do it. I cannot speak more highly of Embrace and will continue to utilize their services for my pup now and my pups in the future."
"The person in customer service was‚Ä¶ The person in customer service was great and very helpful."
"Very easy to use and submit a claim"

"The process was much easier than previou The process was much easier than previous experiences. Last year I had bills that I didn't submit because I dreaded the process. I was overwhelmed with illness in the family and could not not get my head around the forms. however I find this insurance more expensive than others The deductible is outrageous. Dr. Hoffman is fabulous."
"Claims are so easy to do! Claims are so easy to do!"

"Ten Years of Trust Gone Overnight Im really sad to write this review. Ive had Embrace for ten years with no issues and I even recommended them to others long before they had a referral program. As we approached the ten year mark they started calling me nonstop. When I finally spoke with someone they told me my premium was increasing to 4.5x what I had been paying. This was on top of the yearly increases they already apply. They were calling because they KNEW people would be pissed if that auto charge would have happened without letting people know. This is the stage of my dogs life when she needs coverage the most and they raised the premium higher than what I pay for both my own and my sons health insurance combined. It feels like they were trying to push long term customers out before any major vet bills come up. I am extremely disappointed and now my aging dog is left without coverage. Its all shady and typical for an insurance company. I now tell everyone to avoid Embrace and just save money is a pet savings account for the day you may need it."
"Claims & overall site Revised site & claims process much improved & easier"
"Submitting the claim was fast and simple Submitting the claim was fast and simple"

"I talked to two people I talked to two people. The second called me to see what they could do to make the policy work for me. We were on the phone for an hour before we could find a solution. It was amazing customer service."

"As always I appreciate EMBRACE As always I appreciate EMBRACE. A real human answers the phone!!!! AND called me! When does THAT happen anymore. Also It is easy to file a claim. No hidden small print. Whats covered is clear. In the past I have received fair and prompt reimbursement. I hope they never change their way of doing business."
"This was easy and took only a few‚Ä¶ This was easy and took only a few mintues."
"The process of submitting a claim is‚Ä¶ The process of submitting a claim is fairly easy. Claims are also handled in a timely fashion."
"Such Ease and user friendly!"
"Rep's always helpful & courteous. Thank you Rep's always helpful"

"Embrace is a great pet insurance Embrace is a great pet insurance! They make it so easy to put in a claim. So thankful we havent had to put in a claim in a long time but when Bootsie had an ear infection the other day we sent in a claim and got feedback right away. I would recommend this insurance to anybody looking for a good pet insurance!"
"Fast and easy to submit a claim and the‚Ä¶ Fast and easy to submit a claim and the claim is usually paid the next day!"
"It was straightforward and step by step‚Ä¶ It was straightforward and step by step instructions were provided. The whole process did not take long"

"Invited Outstanding Support!!!! We have been with Embrace since August 2024. Our coverage includes wellness accident and illness insurance for two adult male cats. We just submitted our first two illness claims resulting from a significant initially life threatening stroke suffered by one of them. Treatment included emergency ICU and stabilization procedures at one practice for two days followed by two additional days at a neurological specialist and advanced care facility. Embrace approved both claims within 24 hours. The claims process was both flawless and seamless - truly outstanding in all regards. In all aspects our experience denoted a competent professional and caring company that provides its advertised services in an exemplary manner. Highly recommend in all regards. 6.0 on a 5.0 scale."
"I like the ease and speed filing a‚Ä¶ I like the ease and speed filing a claim takes."
"Quick and easy claim submission Quick and easy claim submission. Usually doesn't rake long for reimbursement."
"Quick and easy submission Quick and easy submission. Terms of the policy seem to be fair and really help. Years ago I had pet insurance which did little to nothing."
"Embrace Pet Insurance has provided excellent service Embrace Pet Insurance has provided excellent coverage for my Dachsund Luna. Claims have been acted upon in a quick and timely manner."
"Easy to submit online and quick‚Ä¶ Easy to submit online and quick response time everytime I've called with a question everyone has been friendly and courteous!"
"All went well."

"Invited Exceeded expectations The claims process was quick efficient easy and very fast. The claim was processed within 24 hours and the reimbursement was received within a couple days. Very happy with the entire process."
"Super easy submitting claim. Super easy submitting claim."

"Embrace delivers Embrace delivers! I constantly have excellent service from awesome people. They are fast efficient and alerts kind and professional. As long as I have pets I will have embrace. Elise B"
"FAST and EASY!"

"Invited I am 100% happy and grateful for Embrace Pet Insurance This is my first experience with pet insurance and I could not be happier with Embrace. After my dachshund was diagnosed with a significant issue I crossed my fingers that the coverage would kick in and that it would be a seamless and easy process. It has been both simple and easy. I've submitted several claims and all of them were reviewed the day they were submitted and paid that same day. Every call I've had with them has been very helpful and pleasant. They are responsive and seem to really care about my dogs care and my experience. I wish my own personal insurance was as easy!"
"Embrace has been AMAZING!! Embrace has been AMAZING!!! Ive had in the last week 4 vet visits that they have been so quick with response and approval and payments for the visits!"
"Always a prompt and accurate response"

"Invited Tries to deny claims Theyre an insurance company that does everything they can to deny a claim. Did you bring your pet to the vet after noticing strange behaviors and symptoms? Well according to them that dont qualify for insurance even if your pet is prescribed medicines and/or a diet."
"User Friendly Claim process is pretty easy."
"I am so thankful I have embrace for my‚Ä¶ I am so thankful I have embrace for my two pups Chubbs and Darlie it give me peace when I have to take them to vet no matter what is going on"

"The Embrace website is HORRIBLE!!! The Embrace website is clumsy hides info to check for errors slow to send confirmation emails in a word: DISASTEROUS! I will be looking to switch my pet insurance just for the HORRIBLE EMBRACE WEBSITE DISASTER!"
"Very easy to submit the claim! Very easy to submit the claim!"
"Invited Great experience The claims portion is so easy to use. Well explained and fast. We made claims and 2 hours later they were complete. Great experience!"
"Always very quick with a fair response Always very quick with a fair response. Recommend this pet insurance for anyone with pets."
"Very easy to submit a claim."

"I had such a great experience using this site! The process to file a claim was super easy and straightforward ‚Äî everything was clearly explained and it only took a few minutes to complete. The layout is clean and user-friendly and I really appreciated how quick and efficient the whole process was. Highly recommend this site to anyone who wants a fast and hassle-free way to submit a claim!"

"Our First Experience With Embrace! Recently our rescue puppy JR now 9 years old required surgery for an ear hematoma. We have had Embrace Insurance since we brought him home but until now had never used it so I was a little apprehensive about filing a claim. I have to say that it was one of the easiest most transparent processes I have ever been through with any insurance company. I uploaded the invoice from the vet answered a few short questions and the submission was done. The time was 3:18 pm EST. At 3:34 pm EST I received an email acknowledging the submission and giving us the good news that the claim was complete and that the surgery was covered by our policy! Embrace kept me informed every step of the way the submission process was simple and clear and the resolution was lightning fast! I am still shaking my head in disbelief at how easy this was and thankful that I kept this coverage from the beginning. This is a great company that I highly recommend! Well done Embrace!!! And THANK YOU!!!"

"Embrace is great! Embrace is a great company to insure your pets; we have worked with them for at least 10 years. Submitting claims is easy they cover a great amount and I have never had issues with them. Its nice to have the trust that our pets can get the care they need and we can afford it because of Embrace."
"Website is easy to work with Website is easy to work with. Customer service and reimbursements are quick. Just hoping they can keep their rates the same as my contract is going to expire soon."
"Easy claims submission and fast‚Ä¶ Easy claims submission and fast payment. Website is easy to navigate and this insurance is priced right!!"
"just followed directions they were‚Ä¶ just followed directions they were plain and clear"
"Claim Speedy efficient responses via email and claim."
"Easy to file a claim."
"I'm satisfied with how my claim is processed. Its expeditiously paid. No hassles. I'm satisfied with how my claim is"

"Quick and Fair Our Pit-Lab mix dog Coco has been insured by Embrace Pet Insurance since she was 6 weeks old. She was given a clean bill of health and after the required waiting period she has had full coverage up to $10000. At the age of 3 Coco was diagnosed with Exocrine Pancreatic Insufficiency a genetic disease that can be treated but not cured. The treatment is over $500 per month but Embrace has been paying 80% of that cost continuously since she was diagnosed. My rates have not risen any more than a healthy dog and they have never refused a claim."
"Fast and easy to submit claims"
"Your employees are your best‚Ä¶ Your employees are your best Ambassadors for your business. They ROCK!!!!!"
"Submitting a claim Submitting a claim. Just had to submit a claim. My dog ate a corn cob. The website is very easy to work with and Embrace customer service is excellent"
"Submitting a claim was way easier than‚Ä¶ Submitting a claim was way easier than I expected."

"Fast and easy claim process and reimbursement We have been customers of Embrace for over a decade and are always impressed by their service. Pricing is fair and I appreciate the ability to add on services like wellness. The online claims submission is incredibly easy and the explanation of benefits is easy to understand. Even if something is not covered I understand why. I wish all insurance were this easy to deal with!"

"Embrace has covered my cats for nearly 15 years Embrace has been covering my two cats for most of their 15 years. It has been easy to file claims. I receive electronic reimbursements. I have peace of mind that I can continue to afford and pursue quality care for my boys as they age."
"Simplicity of use."

"I am very happy with Embrace Pet‚Ä¶ I am very happy with Embrace Pet Insurance. We got the insurance about 5 years ago and didn't really need to use it until this year and the process to file a claim was really easy."
"To submit a claim is very easy To submit a claim is very easy. App is user Friendly. Thank you for making this so easy."
"Telephone kept disconnecting after‚Ä¶ Telephone kept disconnecting after waiting for many minute. Disconnections when taking to a rep Finally got log in figured out and now I am happy."

"Customer Service Grossly Misrepresents their Policies My pet insurance policy was misrepresented to me prior to purchase but Embrace is telling me that they don't uphold anything said by their customer service reps. I attempted to clarify a policy detail with customer service prior to purchasing the policy and they assured me that only pre-existing conditions were not covered by the policy. The reality is that any condition which the insurance company deems related to a pre-existing condition is additionally not covered by the policy. In my case one of my cats has Entropion which is considered a pre-existing condition since she has had it since birth. I paid for the surgery to correct it but now Embrace informed me that any eye conditions (for example conjunctivitis) will not be covered at all by the policy unless the vet can clearly attribute the cause to an injury or other illness. If they cannot they will just assume the eye condition is related to the pre-existing condition (Entropion). This is a gross misrepresentation of the policy given that I explicitly asked customer service questions to try and understand what was and was not covered and this exclusion was not mentioned to me."
"Submitting a claim was easy Submitting a claim was easy. Hopefully I will be reimbursed for my dog's care in an expedient manner."
"Excellent service!!!!"

"DO NOT RECCOMEND!! UPDATE: Wow did you see how fast I got a response to a negative review but can't get a reply as a paying client re: any questions to my policies or claims??? And yes we can change plans or premiums but if you read the reviews of anyone who has tried it just gets even worse and MORE costly!! AnIMBURSES???? How can it reimburse when it's our own money??? And then you take any remaining funds that are not used at the end of the year. Don't try to spin it any other way than They're just a greedy corporate machine that cares more about profit than the health and well-being of our pets. And this is evidenced by how all they do is defend their shady policies in these comments. Not once have they admitted fault and helped a policy holder instead they just spew their excuses and make no concessions! First they lure you in with low monthly premiums for the 1st year then raise them a ridiculous and unfair amount every.single.year! And do not give the BS excuses for changing info on pet breeds and certain states approving your insane increases because that is just a load of crap. When trying to get reimbursed for treatments or medications they constantly deny deny deny!! And DO NOT let them talk you into their program!!! It benefits no one except them!! You pay into the wellness program with your OWN money use it to pay for all of the many many things they don't cover but at the end of the year if you have unused money in the wellness account THEY KEEP IT!!!! This is a direct quote from their website Any unused amount of the annual maximum will not roll over and is non-refundable.How is this wellness program a benefit to the policy holder? It's not! It's only a benefit to Embrace. I had to take a pet to the ER and the medication the ER doctor thought was the best medication to treat my pet happened to be an over-the-counter medication and not an Rx and Embrace refused to cover it! So now they know better than our vets what's best for our pets? Why should it matter if the RECOMMENDED medication is an FDA approved Rx or not? It's what THE VET recommended! Just wrong wrong wrong. And don't even get me started on how IMPOSSIBLE it is to contact anyone at Embrace!!! I tried for over a week via emailthe claims portal the online chat feature etc and NO ONE would get back to me. But they have TONS OF TIME to comment on all the negative reviews they get here! Unbelievable. I DO NOT RECOMMEND EMBRACE!"

"Always very prompt and caring Always very prompt and caring. Never had a problem with submitted claim. From all the horror stories I hear from pet owners this is the one you should have so no headaches"

"Great to work with When I purchased the policy the agent explained the coverages recommended for a puppy. I had two puppies at the time that are now 2 years old. Since purchasing the policies for both my fur babies they have had sick visits and one hospital stay. I never though I would need pet insurance but I'm glad I chose Embace. I"
"Easy to submit claims through the‚Ä¶ Easy to submit claims through the website."
"Easy reimbursement Easy reimbursement. Awesome!"
"WellnessCheck was awesome great vets"
"Easy to navigate even for 74 year old."
"Very easy submitting a claim Very easy submitting a claim. Happy with the service I have received so far."
"Confusion set in but it turns out to be‚Ä¶ Confusion set in but it turns out to be not complicated. So the 4 stars is a beginners experience."

"MAJOR PRICE INCREASE They did okay for awhile. I received about $2500 last year in reimbursements on my $10000 policy.. so they went ahead and raised my rate by over 2x / 100%. From about $150 per month to about $350 per month!! In one year for barely using the policy.. highway robbery.."

"I've been using Embrace for about 8‚Ä¶ I've been using Embrace for about 8 years. It's been great as far as having the easiest submittal procedures. Their rates are very reasonable compared to a lot of other pet insurances. One thing that sometimes irritates me a bit is that the website is slow. Little space dog sometimes takes his sweet time in changing pages. Otherwise no complaints!"

"Lots of experience I have had Embrace pet insurance coverage for 2 dogs and 2 cats over the last 7 years. I did not find coverage for the cats worthwhile so I dropped them from my policy. I also did not find the Wellness Program worthwhile as it's basically a savings account specifically for pet use but if you don't use it all like FSA funds you lose it. It was frustrating to see my coverage increase substantially as my dog aged but whenever I needed to use the insurance Embrace came through. The claim submission process is super easy and when my Sparty's time with us came to an end the Embrace staff was incredibly compassionate. Cancer took my best furry friend rather abruptly but the outpouring of sympathy was much appreciated. Thank you Embrace."

"I have been using Embrace for quite‚Ä¶ I have been using Embrace for quite awhile now and they have been extremely good for all my animals. I have had to file a number of claims and I have never had a problem with them. The only holdup I have ever had was because the veterinarian neglected to put something in the paperwork."
"Great customer service and explanation‚Ä¶ Great customer service and explanation of benefits"

"My representative was so informative My representative was so informative. I appreciate her time explaining in detail what the insurance covers. A satisfying experience knowing my dogs and soon litter will be protected by a good insurance company that meets your needs and budget friendly I will recommend to new owners of my puppies as well"
"Simple process Simple process. I'll be more please when the claim is accepted."

"On hold for way too long trying to‚Ä¶ On hold for way too long trying to remove a dog that passed away and then they credited me for the wrong amount. Long time customer of Embrace but doubt I shall continue with them."
"Submitting a claim is easy and being‚Ä¶ Submitting a claim is easy and being reimbursed is quick. All my questions were answered with satisfaction I‚Äôm glad I insured my pets with Embrace."
"easy claim submittal"
"I had help from two different gals I had help from two different gals they each were very helpful and sweet!"

"I have had this for about eight months‚Ä¶ I had this for about eight months now paying about $60 a month. I rescued this little guy from the shelter and he had been trying to get out of his crate there and had a little hair loss at the top of his head which was noted when I took him in to get a check up took him in for a yeast ear infection and somehow that is related to the hair loss and is not going to be covered. I also had an issue with him having diarrhea and the doctor treated it with probiotic instead of medication because they treated it with probiotic insurance will not cover the visit so I am not having much luck with them. I‚Äôll be surprised if they ever pay for anything if I keep them."
"They keep raising prices with out‚Ä¶ They keep raising prices with out notice! I haven‚Äôt use this policy not one time!"
"Long Term Customer Have been insured by Embrace for 2 different Pets for 11 years. 6 years with Ali all experiences have been excellent."

"Invited Great Customer Service I reached out to them to figure out what additional information was needed for a claim. The representative stayed on the phone with me while she checked it out and called others. Within 24 hours I received a detailed note explaining the process and my policy. They did a great job."
"Great pet insurance Great pet insurance. easy to submit claims and quick payment"

"Embrace has been easy to deal with Embrace has always responded quickly and and clearly answered any questions I have. They have promptly paid and he covered reimbursements. Everyone I have dealt with there has been friendly and helpful."

"Embrace pet ins representatives were‚Ä¶ Embrace pet ins representatives were very prompt and helpful friendly and caring. This was our first time getting pet insurance and they made it easy no stress! The claim process was quick and easy and I got my reimbursement within a few days.Im so glad we chose Embrace!"

"Submitting claims online is super easy‚Ä¶ Submitting claims online is super easy w/Embrace. For the most part their reimbursement amounts are pretty decent& their customer service on the phone is very good. However I just hope that they don‚Äôt jack up their monthly rates again in the spring like they did this last spring when my policy renewed. Fortunately I was able to raise my deductible and bring the premium back down to a reasonable level‚Ä¶."

"Invited Easy claims process Easy claims process good customer service."
"I love this insurance I love this insurance. It gives me a piece of mind that if anything happens to Dolly she's protected"

"Best Pet Insurance out there! The Embrace Pet Insurance web page is very easy to use. Making a claim takes under a minute and they are very prompt with reply‚Äôs and reimbursement. This company knows what they are doing and it makes my life less stressful! Thank You Embrace!!!"

"Always fast with claims Always fast with claims friendly knowledgeable employees that seem to sincerely care. I‚Äôve been with Embrace for over 12 years and several Boxers. They‚Äôve never let me down. I 100% recommend Embrace to anyone/everyone that wants to help your pet and your pocketbook in the best health possible."
"Customer service is exceptional."

"Very happy with Embrace I have a senior dachshund who has frequent visits to his vet for skin ear and heart issues. Embrace responds to my claims and reimbursement is directly deposited in my bank account within a few days. Also Embrace makes it very easy to file a claim on line. Very happy with our choice of pet insurance."

"Great experience every time Great experience. In reading so many other reviews I suggest people get this insurance from the start and never lapse on their payment. Very low chance of difficulty then. They get on it very quickly!"

"Wonderful expedient experience and reimbursement I‚Äôve had embrace pet insurance for many years now and my 10 year seven month old golden Shepherd was diagnosed with congestive heart failure an arrhythmia. Embrace has been wonderful about reimbursing me for all the medicines and Cardiology appointments."
"THEY ARE FAIR THEY ARE FAIR"

"Amy from Embrace never followed-up with‚Ä¶ Amy from Embrace never followed-up with alternative policies as promised after Embrace sent me a 67% increase for my renewal. I submitted zero claims and have a healthy pet."

"My dog needed surgery for a luxating‚Ä¶ My dog needed surgery for a luxating patella. The claims were very easy to file online and I received reimbursement within a week. The surgery costs with preop appointments was close to $4000 so I was very grateful to have the coverage. The only complaint I have is about the increase of premiums after the first year. The coverage was well worth it though"

"Premature request for review You prompted me to write a review about submitting a claim. Yes the apparent submission seemed simple enough. As you have not approved it nor have I received reimbursement yet it seems quite oddly premature. Edit: I now see this review is tagged as an unprompted review which is clearly a lie."

"Totally awesome company My fur baby was very sick with pancreatitis and when I took her to the veterinary clinic it was a total relief not to worry about the cost I just told them do what needs to be done. I sent them a photo of the bill and in a few days I was reimbursed my 90% it cost me. 100.00"
"Simple claims submission process from‚Ä¶ Simple claims submission process from website."

"Invited When I signed up they requested my dogs history needless to say didn‚Äôt know they hadn‚Äôt received it until I needed to use their insurance and are unreasonably denying to pay for a lump deemed nothing to worry about from two vets so now will not cover bumps or cancer this is how they get out of coverage. Very unhappy . Beware"

"I just insured our new kitten that we‚Ä¶ I just insured our new kitten that we got and the process was very easy and fast and the cost is nicely laid outso far I am happy  let‚Äôs see after I use it.üòÉ"

"I've used Embrace for 6 years I've used Embrace for 6 years! Embrace continues to provide exceptional insurance coverage for my two pets. The reimbursement process is easy and quick. I highly recommend and appreciate their customer service."
"Friendly service"
"Very reasonable and fair treatment Very reasonable and fair treatment. Much better than what I'm used to with pet insurance."
"Very easy to work with! Very easy to work with!"
"Easyclaim processing. Very easy and fast claim processing."

"The rep Veronica was very understanding‚Ä¶ The rep Veronica was very understanding and looked into my issue and was able to solve it I have been with Embrace over 15 years and it cane in handy when Rowen was bite by snake which required him to stay 3 days in the hospital. Thank g-d he was gummy covered I have two policies the Wellness policy and major medical I always adj pet owners do you have pet insurance either they say never heard of pet insurance or they say why should I have it. That‚Äôs when I get on my soapbox Thank you EMBRACE Rheeta and Rowen ‚ô•Ô∏è"

"Shameful Shameful. After paying dutifully into our coverage for 11 years they more than doubled our premium in one year without raising our coverage. So we would always be paying them more than ever possibly receiving. It is shameful and disgraceful and heartbreaking. Leaving us high and dry in Rocky‚Äôs final years."

"Long time happy customer Long time happy customer My cavalier has been covered by Embrace since puppyhood. He's now 12 years and it's been quite the ride: he's a wonderful dog with lots of medical problems over the years. I've been very happy with the coverage Embrace has provided for his emergency care."

"Embrace makes it so easy Embrace makes it so easy. I will always use Embrace for all my pets. Rarely are there any rejections. We live in a very rural place my dog is always getting hurt. So we embrace Embrace pet insurance. Thanks for your love."
"The ease in submitting the claim The ease in submitting the claim. Easier than doing anything for humans."

"Embrace did not cover all the claims I‚Ä¶ Embrace did not cover all the claims I submitted for my pet Peanut who is now dead. She was diagnosed with a tumor that ruptured in her ear. I submitted a precertification for a catscan procedure for them to find out how bad was the tumor. This procedure was also denied by Embrace."
"Vets did a great job!"
"Simple and Intuitive Very easy to navigate and did not take much time at all."

"Great Customer Support I had a small issue with having to change information in my account. I called customer service and had a flawless experience. The change was effective immediately. The representative was extremely helpful and always kept me informed. No complaints from me."
"It is a reall seamless process to‚Ä¶ It is a reall seamless process to submit claims and rapid turnaround time for reimbursement (<1 week). Excellent service highly recommend!"
"Extreamly long hold timed and lots of‚Ä¶ Extreamly long hold timed and lots of automatic messages from filed claims."

"I haven‚Äôt been able to reach anyone at‚Ä¶ I haven‚Äôt been able to reach anyone at Embrace. I have a question about coverage. Their website bot is useless and no one picked up the phone over 15 minutes so I gave up."
"Super easy online claim filing and‚Ä¶ Super easy online claim filing and super fast reimbursement."
"Excellent service Easy transactions"

"Claim process Submission of a claim was fairly simple. When additional information was needed they reached out to the provider. I had to take Jack to an emergency vet as our normal vet does not have night hours. I received an Email telling me how much of my claim was approved with little explanation. With a vet bill of over $1100 I felt the reimbursement of slightly over $300 was on the low side. Still I‚Äôm glad I had insurance to get some money back"

"Submission of a claim was fairly simple When additional information was needed they reached out to the provider I had to take Jack to an emergency vet as our normal vet does not have night hours I received an Email telling me how much of my claim was approved with little explanation With a vet bill of over 1100 I felt the reimbursement of slightly over 300 was on the low side Still Im glad I had insurance to get some money back"

"Ive had Embrace for my dog since she was a puppy and shes now 11 Its very easy to submit a claim online claims are reviewed and resolved very quickly and Ive always had clear communication from Embrace"
"Clementine was awesome and her explanation of benefits very pleased so far"

"Phone help was outstanding Still waiting for response to email help and inability to access account settings POST RESPONSE nice to see they dont read the review either I am STILL waiting for an email response about my inability to access and change my account info"
"The Embrace website is so easy to use to file claims I am extremely pleased with Embrace"

"Wonderful personalized professional service from a caring professional her name was Yunelly She explained to me that if I did nothing our two cats that are now 14 years old would be having a near double increase in their monthly premium She went over alternatives and how to reduce the premium and explain how come the rate was going up I kind of understood why most of it was going to be but I really need to be honest was a bit shocked at the amount of increase You have to admit we really treat our babies like humans anyway its pretty much the same cost as a human healthcare insurance when they get older Anyway she was wonderful and help me make a decision on how to move forward"
"Frustrating when the exact diagnosis is not listed Also the review function would not let me review my submitted invoice and would only display the circle of confusion"
"Easy to submit claim Clear directions"
"Very easy to use check or file a claim"
"My dog had to have a tooth removal and a representative told me it was probably covered up to 75 percent Embrace didnt support 1 percent Also an upgrade in coverage cost doubled"
"The sight is easy to navigate"
"Acted on the claim very quickly just submitted the vet bill of services and they took it from there very happy with the service"
"Submitting the claim was easy to do from my tablet Thank you for making it available rather than having to mail anything in"

"Claim for dental procedures denied as preexisting They failed to discover the preexisting until almost a year after we enrolled The condition was treated and resolved Per policy dental treatment is covered once it is treated and resolved We had it treated and resolved and they still denied it They do not advise you of exclusions for preexisting until a claim is submitted They take the premiums and provide no coverage"

"The claim process was seamless I received precertification within minutes My French Bull dog suffered an acute allergic reaction and had to be rushed to the ER vet Due to the severity he needed an overnight stay but knowing that Embrace covered the cost was incredibly reassuring Hes doing fine now"
"Submitting claims and receiving reimbursements is quick an easy Evaluations are fair"

"I have had multiple claims in the past 4 years for my cockapoo Kelsey I have never had any problems getting my payment I am so happy I purchase this insurance if not I would be very hard pressed for money to pay for her to have care"

"App is broken Spent a long time attempting to file my first claim and finally was able to do so on the desktop app I had Pets Best in the past and may consider switching back to them because its very glitchy and there isnt a way to upload anything under the wellness plan The interface with Pets Best was easier and they had a working app"
"Takes too long to get paid Too automated cant talk to a real person all the time"
"The ease in filing a claim is remarkable Wow"
"Always efficient and dependable"

"Ive been with Embrace for about seven years Until now I had no major issues and only filed a few small claims This past year my dog needed ACL surgery an expensive but necessary procedure that Embrace covered I appreciated that but any goodwill I had evaporated when I received my renewal notice My annual premium is jumping from 1300 to 2500 Thats almost a 100 percent increase in a single year When I called to ask why I was told it wasnt because of my large claim but honestly its hard to believe How else can you explain doubling the cost This kind of pricing is not just frustrating it is punishing Many of us cant afford that kind of sudden increase especially after already paying thousands over the years for coverage we hoped wed never need I understand costs rise as pets age but this is excessive and feels exploitative Pet insurance should protect pet owners from financial strain not create more of it Embrace needs to be transparent and accountable for how these massive rate hikes are justified because right now it feels like loyal customers are being taken advantage of the moment they actually use the coverage theyve been paying for I expected an increase but this is absolutely unacceptable"

"I am very impressed with Embrace From the agent who sold me our pet policy to our first claim process I have been extremely pleased Even when you call to ask a question the people are very helpful professional and courteous Definitely glad I went with Embrace for our pet insurance"
"Agent took the time to fully explain policy and gave detailed instruction on how to file a claim"
"Do not spend the monthly fees they are all the same wont cover any emergency procedures"
"Submitting the claim was simple Now if the payment process is just as easy I will be thrilled"
"The app kept stopping so I had to use my computer Thats fine but what if I didnt have access to a computer Id be stuck"

"The app is easy use However every time I file a claim they say they need all paper work for my dog called the SOAP I have sent it numerous times via email and the app but keep getting my claims delayed by weeks or months because they say they do not have all her paper work when they do It can be frustrating and annoying every time I file a claim have to explain they have all the paper work and then waiting months to finally get reimbursed after several back and forth emails Its like nothing is saved in my file I cant understand the issue"

"I have two policies with Embrace Never used them I decided to give it a try with three bills from emergency vet visits in 2024 After six months of trying multiple phone calls I was unable to get my receipts taken care of because they said Codie had been seen by a vet they had no records for in 2020 I had given them all his vet visits As he was rescued during the pandemic I had about four visits with different vets The three bills were all less than 350 dollars and were for diarrhea and a rash Still they refuse to pay nor communicate with me No matter how long I sit on the phone or how many calls I make I have paid them over 4500 dollars I am canceling because this is ridiculous They are just taking my money My next call will be a report to the BBB"
"Terrible customer service"
"Very easy to submit claims and easy to contact on phone and helpful and kind"
"Great quick claim service Received reimbursement of funds quickly"
"Simple to use and fair pricing"
"Great team"

"I wasnt sure that insurance was worth it but on the first visit I paid 249 Embrace reimbursed me 150 of that which is great One charge was a fecal test at 70 I have 90 percent coverage and 100 deductible"

"I cancelled my policy on all four of my dogs My claim for unrelated growth removals was denied as preexisting even after my vet explained they were unrelated Embrace denied the appeal This was my first experience with pet insurance and I regret choosing Embrace They have a pattern of denying legitimate claims based on reviews I take excellent care of my dogs and this company made the situation aggravating and disappointing Do your research before trusting them"
"Easy claim process just would like more wellness coverage"
"So easy to submit a claim and payment is timely do love this insurance"

"Embrace is morally bankrupt They raise premiums astronomically after pets age or need care I was a customer for 14 years and my premiums increased 40 percent last year and 83 percent this year They hide behind excuses like inflation but its clear they care more about shareholders than pets I regret ever supporting them They have no loyalty to long term customers BEWARE"
"Submitting a claim was easy and they were very prompt in sending the money I was due"
"always fast to submitt a claim always fast to submitt a claim"
"Im very happy with this coverage for my two dogs"
"Im writing this review because Embraces website essentially makes you write a review in order to submit claims Ive actually had a decent experience with them aside from this"
"Very easy to complete a claim The website provides a nice stepwise process and is clear and easy to read and navigate"
"Documents were provided for dental but also for two growth removals including margins Embrace never considered the growths Very disappointing given the 1400 per year premiums"
"Easy quick and effective"
"excellent service"

"Embrace has been an excellent company to work with Their representatives are pet friendly professional and efficient Submitting claims is really easy We have had Embrace for two cats and now for two dogs and a cat I am a very satisfied customer"
"Betsy made my renewal process very easy and understandable Thank you very much"
"Submitting a claim was very easy the prompts walked me through it quickly I spoke to a representative who helped me with the online process Hoping our claim gets taken care of for us"
"We have used Embrace pet insurance for 9 years now always with a good experience especially during the hard times"
"Hannah was excellent and was so helpful during the setup process I would highly recommend"
"great processing of claim good timming"
"Very easy process wish human claims were this easy"
"I just submitted my first claim It was very easy but I have not received an approval yet lets see how it goes"

"Embrace insurance is very deceiving on how they do their claims They nit pick all the fees picking only the low fees like a cone for an emergency visit but not the actual emergency exam and medicine I feel this is a rip off for all customers The claims adjusters are not good and make the customer do their job I do not recommend this company for anyone"
"Embrace is great The communication ease of claim submission and turnaround time The customer service is on point and exceeds expectations I would recommend and do it all over again"

"For some reason my email is now not associated with an account after I paid 469 for an annual membership Now I have to go through the hassle of figuring out how to fix it so I can even put in a claim"

"I guess this leading statement in the comments box What went wrong this time explains their work My dog is experiencing something causing him to vomit and Ive had numerous tests done to see what might be the cause Because a vet visit 11 and a half months ago mentioned vomiting Embrace stated this is a preexisting condition Vomiting really Who has a dog who never vomits My case is extreme this time but Embrace refused to reimburse me anything They said he would be covered for vomiting in the future if he has no further case of it for 12 months I missed the window of opportunity by half a month"

"Took the insurance for a test drive with my claim Not sure at this time but forty eight point five zero times twelve is about five hundred eighty two per year without meds eight hundred seventy seven point four six deductible and a little over one thousand thirty three for the claims including meds not covered for a total of about one thousand four hundred fifty nine point four six out by the customer I could be off by some change or a dollar but that is the picture I was looking at However they were kind and courteous"

"I called to cancel my plan and was subsequently hung up on when I told the representative that everything is a preexisting condition according to their underwriters as that was my response to her telling me that any new insurance company I select will do the same thing"

"Embrace Pet Insurance is the real deal My dog had to have emergency surgery for bladder stone removal after being diagnosed with a urinary tract infection I received an invoice for the initial visit and another invoice for the surgery I submitted both invoices on Embraces website and two business days later they issued two checks and mailed them I couldnt be happier with this company"
"Easy and straightforward process"
"excellent insurance and simple to file claims"

"No matter what I submit for a claim Embrace finds a reason not to pay out what they promise I have invoices documentation and emails from the vet explaining the diagnosis yet I still have nothing I am not happy and not renewing"
"Is there anyway that you can add Rx Renewal to the diagnosis"
"Very personable and gave me useful information"
"So easy to file a claim I mostly submit for monthly grooming and yearly routine vaccinations Highly recommend Embrace Pet Insurance"
"Wow It was very fast and easy to file the claim"
"Its just so easy sending in your bills a lot easier than my own health insurance"
"Forget it too complicated for old people"

"The response time for Embrace is great but they always try to tie claims to preexisting conditions even when symptoms are unrelated My pup had a pancreatitis attack and because he also had diarrhea during his stay the entire 4500 claim was denied This feels unfair and frustrating"
"I like the easy and practical way I can place a claim without difficulty I love the response time and method"
"My dog got bronchitis took him to the vet He had xrays and antibiotics I sent the invoice to Embrace and was reimbursed in less than a week"
"Unable to select provider from webpage The provider field would not respond on multiple computers and browsers Eventually the phone app worked after several minutes"
"Easy to submit claim but I just submitted it and havent gotten an approval yet so I cannot say if it will be approved"
"wonderful service and an easy website to use"
"Claims processed quickly"
"Thanks to Embrace Pet Insure It is easy to make a claim I am very happy"
"A great company that values dog health Easy to submit"
"I have never had a problem with getting help with questions Always so polite and very helpful"
"Super easy to make the claim and hear back within days"
"Embrace has been very good to work with They tell me what I need to do and help me with the processing of my claims"

"Shamefully increasing to the highest premium each year of my dogs life Ive been with them for 12 yrs They only care about money not the animals They pay for what they say they do because they have to"

"Our kitty had a 3 day hospital stay I sent in my claims and documents and prepared to wait for approval They were approved in less than 24 hours The service is awesome and the coverage was as expected I am very grateful for Embrace"

"Your customer service have NEVER let me down Every person Ive spoken with has been kind knowledgeable and so helpful I love working with your company I PRAY that you never change I know INSURANCE has a stigma Im hoping that EMBRACE actually stays COOL making pets just AS important as their bottom line"
"Fast claims and precertifications Quick accurate and efficient claims process Super fast precertification process of ensuring coverage before proceeding with costly medical testing"

"Embrace has always been wonderful and easy to deal with Claim submission is a breeze and everyone I have ever spoken with is polite and professional They are also very caring for our dogs Highly recommended"

"Not cheap insurance but its really easy to submit a claim and processing is hassle free Frankly I cant believe it My dog has cancer and Ive had to take her to a veterinary teaching hospital at Purdue University for specialized care and the insurance company hasnt given me a problem at all They also pay claims quickly What a relief"

"At this point Im disappointed in Embrace Ive had the policy for 9 months and have not received a cent of repayment yet have paid monthly premiums My account at ASLCA on a for met pet was much easier to navigate and prompt in payment"
"Our cat has been experiencing health issues recently some of which are serious Embrace has reimbursed us for all of the claims we have submitted to them I am very satisfied with this company"

"Its very easy to submit a claim and Embrace usually gets back to me in a reasonable amount of time They make it clear what is and is not covered by my cats policies what the deductible is so I dont have to worry about any of that Im getting a great deal on the one cat who has a claim every month for her prescription and the other cat only ever used his once but boy was I glad to have insurance when he did"
"Please trust that this is the absolute slimy company you are reading reviews to try to avoid"

"I am not very computer literate however by following directions that were easily understood I was able to file a claim Your website is very user friendly I also had a conversation not too long ago with one of your employees and was very pleased with how considerate and helpful she was"
"Customer service was great as always"
"I love Embrace Pet Insurance It is so easy to upload a claim and they process it right away If you have any questions or concerns their staff is helpful and quick to resolve your problems if any"
"They were very fast in completing my claim I got about 90 percent of the bill back Im very happy with this insurance"

"Our family has been protected by Embrace since Hollys Gotcha Day Its been 4 years now with unwavering protection from Embrace to Hollys wellbeing They kept their promise and covered Hollys healthcare needs reimbursing all the vet and specialty care Holly went through TPLO on both hind knees a tumor on her tail and now back pain related to spinal disc infection and inflammation in the last 4 years Embrace is there for us through all these We are grateful for Embrace and will recommend them to anyone needing pet insurance"

"First of all thrilled to talk to a real person and secondly their insurance programs for pets are wonderful Easy to submit claims takes a couple of minutes and reimbursement occurs within two weeks The wellness program is a great add in to our emergency and sick policy allowing for grooming wellness checkups food and is a great all around saver Love it"
"You get answers quickly My questions are always answered and representatives are always very polite and informative"

"Embrace is a total scam You are better off saving the premium money for when your pet needs to see a vet Despite having received my vet records for the 12 month prepolicy Embrace is still withholding reimbursement for an emergency vet visit due to an insect bite 6 months ago They are now requesting vet records from 4 years ago so they can keep hunting to try to find that preexisting condition to get them out of reimbursing me Beware"
"I got a quick response but it did not answer my question I have asked again twice but to no avail"

"We insured our dog with Embrace her whole life The monthly premium started at around 60 dollars and steadily increased over the years Last year we paid them nearly 5000 in premiums with barely any claims On her 12th birthday they emailed me telling us we would now have to pay 733 a month 8796 a year for a 10k yearly max The options they offered still left my dogs recent injury and physical therapy poorly covered and it feels like the model is broken Save the money yourself and set it aside while your pets are young and healthy so you can support them yourself as they age"

"I spoke to a customer representative who answered the call within a minute She promptly reviewed my submissions and approved three of them while on the phone and submitted two others to an adjuster Within 2 days these were also approved I was very impressed by the pleasantness efficiency and knowledge of this representative"
"Best pet insurance company I am kind of blown away"
"Frustrating process to receive claims They have yet to refund my claims and it has been over 4 months"

"We have been with Embrace Pet Insurance for years They have always paid quickly and been a godsend when our dog developed a cancerous tumor and needed radiation treatment He is doing great and this visit was for a different issue and I do not expect any problems"
"They make it easy and helpful when submitting claims"

"I have a dog with serious liver disease and have submitted multiple invoices large and small to Embrace They have consistently repaid me in a timely manner and this gives me a bit of comfort during a scary time"

"I was having difficulty logging in to file a claim The customer service person was so patient and advised me how to best access my account so I could file a claim I got into my account the first time after taking her advice and was able to submit my claim in about 2 minutes"
"Embrace has been responsive and covered a significant amount of the costs I really appreciate the speed of review and the acceptance of the diagnosis"
"I would recommend Embrace for when you are bringing a new puppy home It is a lot harder and more frustrating trying to get an older dog covered"
"Your computer system is so easy and intuitive Claims are processed promptly"
"After nearly 5 years of just having a policy and never needing it I was pleasantly surprised by the ease of submitting claims for my cats emergency care visit"

"Thorough wellness exam performed as usual Directions and feedback were easy to understand and to the point The doctor and assistant were very nice and caring and I felt good about the whole experience"

"Requesting a claim is easy However they do not let you submit the medical records from your vet They email your vet and copy you and my vet submitted medical records for two dates but they only approved the first one and kept the second on hold despite me emailing and uploading documents It is a lot of work on your end to submit a claim"
"It is really super easy to submit a claim It is usually processed quickly and you receive your payment quickly"

"For 10 years Embrace has been covering Jacks vet bills and reimbursing us in a timely manner They were very sympathetic when they learned of Jacks death from heart failure and I recommend Embrace for anyone needing very good medical coverage for their furry friends"

"I was asked to write a follow up regarding submission of an invoice that got tweaked somewhere along the way It was no problem whatsoever Embrace made it easy to email a new copy without going through the rest of the process again and the claim was paid the same day They were very helpful as they always are and we truly appreciate a business that is so easy to deal with"
